pkgmetadata.longdescription: Hierarchical Structural Equation Model // We present this package for fitting structural equation models using the hierarchical likelihood method. This package allows extended structural equation model, including dynamic structural equation model. We illustrate the use of our packages with well-known data sets. Therefore, this package are able to handle two serious problems inadmissible solution and factor indeterminacy doi:10.3390/sym13040657.
